'''''Waveriding Treasure Hunter (III)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open 160 [[Chest]]s in the [[Liffey Region]] and the [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]].
